title: Kaspium testnet gRPC UNAVAILABLE - tn10.kaspa.org DNS failure
description: Kaspium mobile wallet fails to connect to Testnet-10 with gRPC error: Failed host lookup tn10.kaspa.org. Added troubleshooting section to README with workarounds: use Kaspa-NG, check nodes-tn10.kaspa.ws, or run own TN10 node. KasPay REST API (api-tn10.kaspa.org) is unaffected.

title: API docs page missing 7 endpoints
description: API docs page was missing: GET /api/auth/me, PATCH /api/links/:id, GET /api/webhooks, PATCH /api/settings, GET /api/price, GET /api/network. Also missing error response format and webhook events table. All added.

title: Landing page mobile nav overflow
description: Nav buttons on landing page overflowed on mobile screens. Added hamburger menu with slide-down mobile navigation panel. Also added Demo link to nav bar.

title: Improve footer with ecosystem links
description: Footer was minimal with just logo and tagline. Added 3-column layout with Product links (demo, docs, register) and Kaspa Ecosystem links (kaspa.org, explorer, faucet).

title: README update with full API reference and troubleshooting
description: Updated README with: complete API reference table (15 endpoints), webhook events, Kaspa integration details (explorer/faucet URLs), troubleshooting section for testnet gRPC issues and common problems, database schema overview, updated project structure.

title: Payment page testnet info enhancement
description: Enhanced testnet notice on payment page with links to Kaspa-NG wallet and testnet faucet, plus tip about Kaspium gRPC error workaround.

title: Add rate limiting to API endpoints
description: API endpoints currently have no rate limiting. Should add per-IP and per-merchant rate limits to prevent abuse. Consider using middleware or edge functions.

title: Add webhook retry logic with exponential backoff
description: Webhook delivery currently fires once with no retry on failure. Should implement retry queue with exponential backoff (3 attempts, 1min/5min/30min).

title: Payment link editing after creation
description: Currently payment links cannot be edited after creation (only status can change via PATCH). Should allow editing title, description, amount, expiry for draft links.

title: Add SEO meta tags and OG images
description: Landing page and payment pages lack proper meta descriptions, Open Graph tags, and Twitter card metadata for social sharing.
